Historic buildings, great fishing & hunting, hiking, snowmobiling in winter, gold panning & mining. Manson Creek is approx. a 4 hr drive North of Prince George on a year round maintained road system. (180 km from Mackenzie or Fort St. James). Manson Creek & Germansen Landing were part of the Golf Rush in the 1870s & 1930s. Water lease is $75 for 5 years.
